original_text: When David arrived at the summit, where people used to worship God, Hushai the Arkite was there to meet him, his robe torn and dust on his head.
korean_text: 다윗이 하나님을 경배하는 마루턱에 이를 때에 아렉 사람 후새가 옷을 찢고 흙을 머리에 덮어쓰고 다윗을 맞으러 온지라

sentences.original_text: When David arrived at the summit
where people used to worship God
Hushai the Arkite was there to meet him
sentences.korean_translation: 아끼 사람 후새가 그를 만나기 위해 그곳에 있었다
